sentences.en: A new form of cancer is running rife throughout the world.
sentences.cn: 一种新型癌症正在全世界流行.

sentences.en: A sharp report like the crack of a rife bullet split the air.
sentences.cn: 爆竹声忽然响起来,空中现了火花.

sentences.en: Comments about impeachment are rife in all media.
sentences.cn: 所有新闻机构都对弹劾问题发表评论.

sentences.en: Disease is rife in the area.
Everything was damp and rife and hot.
sentences.cn: 到处都那么潮湿、拥挤、闷热.

sentences.en: His thesis is rife with errors.
sentences.cn: 他的学位论文错误连篇.

sentences.en: Hollywood soon became rife with rumors.
sentences.cn: 整个好莱坞顿时流言四起。

sentences.en: Rumour is already rife here as to Dr. Trefoil's successor.
sentences.cn: 关于特雷福伊尔博士的继任人,此间已经谣言蜂起.

sentences.en: Rumours about an impending royal divorce were rife.
sentences.cn: 到处都是有关王室成员即将离婚的传言.

sentences.en: Rumours about the plague were rife.
sentences.cn: 有关瘟疫的谣传很盛行.

sentences.en: Rumours were rife that they had met with a terrible disaster and that all were dead.
sentences.cn: 说他们遭到大灾难并全都死了的谣言到处流行.

sentences.en: Speculation is rife that he will be sacked.
sentences.cn: 人们纷纷猜测他会被解雇。

sentences.en: Speculation was rife as to whom the prince might marry.
sentences.cn: 大家都在推测王子会娶谁.

sentences.en: The city was rife with disease and violence.
sentences.cn: 城市中疾病流行,暴力充斥.

sentences.en: The thesis is rife with errors.
Violent crime is rife in our inner cities.
sentences.cn: 暴力犯罪在我们的旧城区非常猖獗。

trans.tran_cn: 流行的，普遍的，盛传的，越来越普及的
trans.tran_en: if something bad or unpleasant is rife, it is very common
